author: Quotidiano Nazionale
title: Caldo a 40 Quattro vittime
text:
Temperature record in 18 citt√† . Cambiano le regole per i lavoratori. .
Caldo e afa torturano l‚ÄôEuropa. E tra le vittime delle spossanti condizioni meteo l‚ÄôItalia soffre particolarmente. Le temperature massime oltre i 40 gradi proiettano scenari estremi a carico dei soggetti vulnerabili. E di notte le citt√† boccheggiano perch√© asfalto e cemento rilasciano calore.
DECESSI E RICOVERI Di caldo si muore anche in riva al mare, magari inseguendo un‚Äôidea di fresco. Due malori stroncano altrettanti turisti in Sardegna: un 75enne di Terni a Budoni, un 57enne di Treviso a San Teodoro. Disidratazione e comorbidit√† portano al decesso un 85enne genovese nonostante la corsa dell‚Äôambulanza al San Martino. Plausibile che il gran caldo sia all‚Äôorigine della morte di un camionista di 70 anni in una piazzola di sosta dell‚ÄôA4 vicino Brescia. Da Nord a Sud, nei pronto soccorso aumentano i ricoveri per malore. Anche Spagna (ieri quattro morti) e Francia (tra le vittime una bimba americana di 10 anni a Versailles) sono in difficolt√†.
BOLLINO ROSSO L‚Äôincandescenza generalizzata trova rappresentazione grafica nelle cartine meteo infuocate e nel bollino rosso attribuito a 18 capoluoghi di provincia. Bologna, Bolzano, Brescia, Firenze, Perugia e Torino sono sotto scacco meteo dal 26 di giugno. Oggi (come ieri) l‚Äôarsura arroventer√† Ancona, Campobasso, Frosinone, Genova, Latina, Milano, Palermo, Rieti, Roma, Trieste, Verona e Viterbo. Domani potrebbero entrare in fascia di rischio Pescara e Venezia, ma risultano in allerta anche Bari, Cagliari, Catania, Messina, Napoli e Reggio Calabria.
PROTEZIONE LAVORATORI I pericoli per la salute in aumento esponenziale trovano una prima risposta nel Protocollo sulle condizioni climatiche estreme , firmato in volata dalla ministra Marina Elvira Calderone con associazioni di categoria e parti sociali. Il documento, che sar√† recepito con decreto ministeriale, introduce misure per proteggere i lavoratori esposti alle alte temperature e garantire la continuit√† delle attivit√† produttive in sicurezza. Tra i punti principali, figura il ricorso automatico alla cassa integrazione in caso di sospensione o riduzione dell‚Äôorario di lavoro, senza che le ore di cassa utilizzate vengano conteggiate nel limite previsto dalla normativa, cos√¨ da evitare penalizzazioni a imprese e lavoratori.
CASO RIDER E NON SOLO Il Protocollo prevede l‚Äôattenta sorveglianza sanitaria degli addetti pi√π esposti, con interventi tempestivi in caso di sintomi di colpi di calore o disidratazione, e contemporaneamente valorizza la diffusione di una corretta informazione e formazione di base tra i lavoratori. "La prima cosa a cui teniamo sono i nostri lavoratori", dichiara il presidente di Confindustria Emanuele Orsini. "Questo protocollo guarda anche ai rider", aggiunge la ministra Calderone, dopo le polemiche per gli esili bonus per il caldo promessi da Glovo. "√à una misura compensativa, non un incentivo", precisa l‚Äôazienda. La cassa integrazione climatica potrebbe essere estesa in corsa agli stagionali dell‚Äôagricoltura.
MASSIMA ATTENZIONE Le temperature altissime potrebbero provocare rovesci improvvisi e allagamenti come ieri in Toscana, con temporali, grandine e tempesta di vento, nella zona di Firenze e in particolare a Prato dove 26,6 millimetri di pioggia sono caduti in soli 30 minuti. Problemi diffusi anche nelle province di Pistoia, Pisa e Arezzo. Firenze, dopo un nuovo blackout elettrico, resta osservata speciale. In Lombardia, cavi danneggiati a Bergamo e qualche apprensione per Milano (sei linee di tram deviate). Secondo Arpa Lombardia, gi√† oggi le temperature dovrebbero calare di 4-6 gradi. In caso di piogge improvvise, i milanesi sono invitati dalle autorit√† a porre attenzione a tutti i sottopassi e alle aree fluviali.
¬© Riproduzione riservata
Tag dell'articolo
Caldo

author: afp
title: Head slays Scotland in rapid Australia win
text: Travis Head smashed 80 off 25 balls as Australia chased down Scotland's 154 to win Wednesday's T20 international in Edinburgh inside 10 overs. Opener Head blitzed five sixes and 12 fours as Australia set the highest-ever T20 international first powerplay score of 113/1 for the opening six overs. The tourists had lost a wicket without a run on the board as Jake Fraser-McGurk fell to a three-ball duck. But Head and captain Mitchell Marsh bludgeoned the Scotland attack. Marsh smashed 30 off one over from Jack Jarvis, while Head reached his half century from just 17 balls. Both fell to Mark Watt in the seventh over but by then the damage had already been done. Wicketkeeper Josh Inglis was able to pick up the baton as his quick-fire unbeaten 27 helped earn Australia a seven-wicket victory with 62 balls to spare. "It was nice for me and the captain to get some runs," Head told the BBC. "It was a tricky start losing Jake, but always nice to have Mitch at the other end, and my role is to maximise the powerplay -- we did that." Scotland came close to shocking the Aussies in the T20 World Cup in June, but struggled to build on a positive start with the bat. George Munsey top scored for the hosts with 28, while Sean Abbott was the pick of the Australia bowlers with three for 39. "That's what you expect against one of the best sides in the world," said Scotland captain Richie Berrington. "We started pretty well with the bat, but unfortunately a few of us got in and didn't kick on. Credit to the Australian bowlers, they made it hard to get away and capitalise on that good start." Scotland 154/9 in 20 overs (George Munsey 28; Sean Abbott 3-39) v Australia 156/3 in 9.4 overs (Travis Head 80, Mitchell Marsh 39; Mark Watt 2-13) Toss: Australia Result: Australia won by 7 wickets. COMMENTS Comments are moderated and generally will be posted if they are on-topic and not abusive. For more information, please see our [Comments FAQ](/comments-policy)

author: IANS
title: Rs 5 lakh accident insurance for gig workers in Telangana
text:
Rs 5 lakh accident insurance for gig workers in Telangana
The state govt has extended its accident insurance scheme to gig workers and platform workers
The Telangana government has extended its accident insurance scheme to gig workers and platform workers in the state, with a coverage of Rs 5 lakh.
The state government has issued an order to extend the scheme, which is already in operation for transport and non-transport auto drivers, home guards and working journalists. The entire cost of premium for the Rs 5 lakh accident insurance for beneficiaries will be covered by the state government.
The state government has designated the commissioner of transport as the master policyholder and the assistant motor vehicle inspectors of the state transport department as the registering authority and the claim-receiving authority respectively for gig workers and platform workers.
The orders were issued a week after chief minister A. Revanth Reddy made the first announcement during a meeting with gig workers.
He had stated that the state government would provide social security to workers across the unorganised sectors. He had also assured that the government would provide Rs 10 lakh health cover to gig workers under the Rajiv Arogyasri Scheme.
Revanth Reddy has also promised that the state government will study the existing policy for gig workers in Rajasthan and introduce an effective law along the same lines in the next Telangana budget session.
He has also announced Rs 2 lakh financial assistance to the family of a food delivery executive who died four months ago after he fell from a building. As per his promise, the chief minister yesterday, 30 December, handed over a cheque for Rs 2 lakh from the Chief Minister‚Äôs Relief Fund to the family of Mohammed Rizwan.
Rizwan, a Swiggy delivery executive died after he fell from the third floor of a building‚Äîhe was apparently trying to run away from a customer‚Äôs pet dog.
During the campaign for the Telangana Assembly elections last month, Congress leader Rahul Gandhi had also assured that if voted to power, the party would bring legislation for the welfare of gig workers on the lines of a the law passed recently in Rajasthan.
During
an interaction with gig workers, he had also promised that after the Congress came to power, the ministers of state would will hold a meeting with them and decide on welfare measures for workers in this sector in consultation with them.

author: St√©phane Cadorette
title: Les Chiefs ma√Ætres dans le froid | Le Journal de Qu√©bec
text: Les Chiefs ma√Ætres dans le froid La victoire face aux Dolphins a √©t√© acquise dans l'un des matchs les plus froids de l'histoire Le plus coriace adversaire des Chiefs au premier tour des s√©ries n‚Äôa pas √©t√© les Dolphins, mais Dame nature, avec une temp√©rature digne de l‚Äô√®re glaciaire √† Kansas City. ‚Ä¢ √Ä lire aussi: [Les Texans sont le futur de la NFL](https://www.journaldequebec.com/2024/01/13/les-texans-sont-le-futur-de-la-nfl) ‚Ä¢ √Ä lire aussi: [Nos pr√©dictions pour le premier tour des s√©ries dans la NFL: retour sur mes choix de d√©but de saison](https://www.journaldequebec.com/2024/01/12/nos-predictions-pour-le-premier-tour-des-series-dans-la-nfl-retour-sur-mes-choix-de-debut-de-saison) Les Chiefs passent √† la ronde suivante en vertu d‚Äôune victoire de 26-7. Le mercure au bott√© d‚Äôenvoi indiquait √† 20 degr√©s Celcius, avec un ressenti de -33. Dans la longue histoire de la NFL, il s‚Äôagit du quatri√®me match le plus froid. D√©barquant tout droit de Miami, les Dolphins avaient l‚Äôair de vouloir se retrouver n‚Äôimporte o√π sur la plan√®te sauf √† Arrowhead Stadium. Le contraste avec les Chiefs √©tait frappant. Tandis que le bon vieux Andy Reid se baladait sur les lignes de c√¥t√©s sans tuque, sans cagoule, une bonne partie du match sans gants et la moustache orn√©e de gla√ßons, le fr√™le Mike McDaniel √©tait habill√© de la t√™te aux pieds comme un explorateur de l‚ÄôAntarctique. Rien √† dire contre la tenue du pilote des Dolphins. Dans les circonstances, c‚Äô√©tait la chose √† faire, mais l‚Äôimage √©tait frappante. Les visiteurs se sentaient comme en captivit√© en Sib√©rie tandis que les locaux avaient l‚Äôair dans leurs pantoufles √† la maison, devant un feu de foyer. Une attaque embouteill√©e En fait, la seule chose qui a √©t√© plus froide que la temp√©rature ambiante dans cette rencontre a √©t√© l‚Äôattaque des Dolphins. Outre un long touch√© de 53 verges de Tyreek Hill sur une passe de Tua Tagovailoa qui r√©duisait l‚Äô√©cart √† 10-7 au deuxi√®me quart, l‚Äôattaque redoutable des Dolphins a √©t√© tenue en √©chec. Depuis le match de la semaine derni√®re, l‚Äôattaque n‚Äôa converti qu‚Äôun troisi√®me essai en 16 tentatives. Hill, qui renouait avec ses anciens partisans de Kansas City, a √©t√© limit√© √† 62 verges. Il n‚Äôa donc pas franchi la barre des 100 verges de gains depuis le 3 d√©cembre, lui qui est incommod√© par une entorse √† une cheville. Au total, l‚Äôattaque a √©t√© limit√©e √† 264 verges. En faisant abstraction du long jeu de 53 verges, c‚Äôest une maigre r√©colte de 3,5 verges par jeu que les Dolphins ont d√ª se r√©signer √† obtenir. Compte tenu de la temp√©rature peu cl√©mente, on se serait attendu que les Dolphins se rabattent davantage sur le jeu au sol, mais cette strat√©gie ne semble jamais faire partie de leur ADN. Chapeau, vraiment, √† la d√©fense des Chiefs! Toute l‚Äôann√©e, cette unit√© a fait le boulot m√™me quand l‚Äôattaque des Chiefs en a arrach√©. Cette performance n‚Äôa donc rien d‚Äô√©tonnant. Du bon et des rat√©s Du c√¥t√© de l‚Äôattaque des Chiefs, Patrick Mahomes a encore √©t√© ma√Ætre chez lui avec sa 10e victoire √† domicile en s√©ries et sa 12e au total. √Ä 28 ans seulement, il rejoint quelques grands quarts-arri√®res comme Troy Aikman, Roger Staubach et Aaron Rodgers. Mahomes a termin√© le match avec 264 verges et une passe de touch√©. √Ä Kansas City en s√©ries, son ratio est maintenant de 31 passes de touch√©s pour trois interceptions. C‚Äôest d‚Äôun ridicule pas possible! M√™me son casque, qui s‚Äôest retrouv√© compl√®tement fissur√© dans le froid lunaire apr√®s un contact, ne l‚Äôa pas emp√™ch√© de dominer. Le porteur Isiah Pacheco a gagn√© durement 89 verges au sol avec l‚Äôautre touch√© des siens. Tenter de plaquer ce jeune homme poss√©d√© par le d√©mon est d√©j√† une t√¢che ardue, mais le faire par des conditions aussi rudes, c‚Äô√©tait mission impossible. L‚Äôattaque a montr√© des signes tr√®s encourageants avec des gains de 409 verges. C‚Äôest une premi√®re r√©colte de plus de 400 verges depuis le 22 octobre, ce qui a de quoi encourager les troupes. Cependant, deux touch√©s seulement ont √©t√© inscrits en six pr√©sences dans la zone payante, ce qui a de quoi laisser perplexe. Mahomes et sa bande ont vraiment impos√© leur rythme et fait bouger le ballon √† leur guise, une main dans le dos face aux blitz r√©p√©t√©s des Dolphins. Il faut toutefois noter que la brigade d√©fensive des Dolphins est absolument d√©cim√©e par les blessures et le duel de deuxi√®me tour pour les Chiefs ne sera fort probablement pas aussi sympathique. Les Chiefs sont donc ma√Ætres chez eux, mais il leur faudra vraisemblablement s‚Äôexiler la semaine prochaine. Il sera captivant de voir comment ils vont r√©agir. Dans le cas des Dolphins, c‚Äôest l‚Äôhistoire qui se r√©p√®te. L‚Äô√©quipe n‚Äôa pas gagn√© un match √©liminatoire depuis 2000. Depuis deux ans, sa fiche en d√©cembre et janvier plombe √† 4-10. L‚Äôaspect physique manque d√©finitivement √† cette √©quipe. La vitesse, c‚Äôest fantastique, mais √ßa court moins vite quand on se les g√®le... LES 3 √âTOILES DU MATCH Rashee Rice Pour tout le mal qui a √©t√© dit avec raison sur les receveurs des Chiefs cette saison, il y en a un qui sort d√©finitivement du lot et c‚Äôest l‚Äôailier espac√© recrue Rashee Rice. Il a capt√© huit passes pour 130 verges et un touch√©, devenant le premier receveur recrue de l‚Äô√©quipe √† franchir la barre des 100 verges en s√©ries. George Karlaftis L‚Äôailier d√©fensif des Chiefs a fait un bond important cette saison avec 10,5 sacs du quart. Il a poursuivi sur cette lanc√©e face aux Dolphins avec 1,5 sac et six plaqu√©s. Nick Bolton Le secondeur fait une √©norme diff√©rence au c≈ìur de la d√©fense des Chiefs. Bolton est le g√©n√©ral, avec 10 plaqu√©s. Il est partout, partout, partout sur le terrain. La d√©fense des Chiefs est tr√®s jeune et Bolton n‚Äôa que 23 ans.

author: RedeTV!
title: RedeTV! Em rede com voc√™
text: Reda√ß√£o RedeTV! [V√≠deo: jovem rema em prancha at√© cruzeiro do Neymar] Rapaz de 20 anos pegou aparelho emprestado para se aproximar de √≠dolo (Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/Instagram) Desde que come√ßou o Cruzeiro do Neymar vem atraindo a aten√ß√£o da web e dos f√£s dos famosos que marcaram presen√ßa na embarca√ß√£o. Tentando se aproximar de um dos eventos mais comentados do momento, um jovem viralizou nas redes sociais ao usar uma prancha de stand up paddle para chegar at√© o navio do craque. Em um v√≠deo divulgado nas redes sociais, √© poss√≠vel ver o influenciador Vinicius Barros interagindo com o garoto que n√£o foi convidado e, at√© mesmo, lan√ßando uma camisa do evento no mar para ele. O jovem foi identificado como Paulo Vitor, um morador de B√∫zios, no Rio de Janeiro, que trabalha em uma barraquinha de peixes na praia. Em entrevista ao O Globo, o carioca de 20 anos contou que pegou a prancha emprestada para tentar se aproximar de seu √≠dolo. ‚ÄúDesde sempre eu remo para lugares distantes. Eu j√° sabia que o Cruzeiro do Neymar iria vir para c√°, e eu s√≥ queria ter a sensa√ß√£o de estar perto do Neymar. Eu pedi um prancha de stand up emprestada e decidir ir at√© l√°.‚Äù Ele tamb√©m contou que se surpreendeu com a aten√ß√£o que recebeu dos tripulantes, uma vez que chegou a ser filmado por Vinicius e o funkeiro MC Maneirinho.‚ÄúCom muito sacrif√≠cio, eu consegui chegar, mas eu n√£o imaginava que algu√©m iria me dar aten√ß√£o, porque n√©? Est√° todo mundo curtindo e tal. Quando eu estava me aproximando j√° tinha um monte de gente gravando e me gritando. Nessa hora, eu aproveitei o momento e pedi uma camisa ou um copo, felizmente consegui o que eu queria. Estou muito feliz com essa experi√™ncia louca que eu fiz, deu muito certo.‚Äù Ver essa foto no Instagram Veja tamb√©m! author: Redacci√≥n EC
title: Sedapal anuncia corte de agua el 16 y 17 de agosto en estos distritos de Lima: Conoce las zonas y horarios
text: El Servicio de Agua Potable y Alcantarillado de Lima (Sedapal) dio a conocer que en distintas partes de Lima Metropolitana habr√° corte de agua. Entre los principales motivos de la suspensi√≥n del servicio est√°n las limpiezas de reservorios y las reparaciones de tuber√≠as rotas. A continuaci√≥n, te daremos todos los detalles sobre esta situaci√≥n: ¬øHabr√° incremento en la tarifa del agua? Esto dijo Sedapal Sedapal se pronunci√≥ respecto a la alerta emitida por la Superintendencia Nacional de Servicios de Saneamiento (Sunass) sobre el posible incremento en la tarifa del agua en Lima y Callao, as√≠ como un aumento significativo en otras regiones. Durante una conferencia encabezada por el gerente general Julio C√©sar de la Rocha Corzo, Sedapal aclar√≥ que no tiene ninguna planificaci√≥n para modificar las tarifas del agua, y subray√≥ que Sunass es el √∫nico organismo autorizado para realizar estos ajustes. Julio C√©sar de la Rocha explic√≥ que la informaci√≥n difundida por Sunass sobre una posible duplicaci√≥n de tarifas en Lima y un incremento de hasta ocho veces en provincias fue malinterpretada y presentada de manera malintencionada. De la Rocha indic√≥ que el anuncio de Sunass se refiere a un embalse de precios que eventualmente deber√° regularse, pero reiter√≥ que Sedapal no ha contemplado ning√∫n cambio en las tarifas actuales. Adem√°s, Sedapal enfatiz√≥ que cualquier ajuste tarifario estar√° dise√±ado para no afectar a las personas en condici√≥n vulnerable y de pobreza extrema. Seg√∫n de la Rocha, los incrementos ser√°n aplicados a aquellos que consumen m√°s de 15 metros c√∫bicos de agua, seg√∫n lo estipulado por Sunass, asegurando que los m√°s necesitados no ser√°n impactados por estos cambios. Qu√© es el n√∫mero de suministro y para qu√© sirve El n√∫mero de suministro de SEDAPAL es un c√≥digo √∫nico que identifica la conexi√≥n de agua de un usuario espec√≠fico. Sirve para identificar y registrar de manera individualizada cada servicio de suministro de agua potable que brinda la empresa a sus clientes. El n√∫mero de suministro es utilizado por SEDAPAL para llevar un registro detallado de cada usuario y su consumo de agua, lo que facilita la facturaci√≥n y la gesti√≥n de los servicios. Adem√°s, permite a SEDAPAL realizar seguimiento de los consumos, llevar un control de los pagos y brindar un mejor servicio al cliente. Para ubicar el n√∫mero de suministro en el recibo de agua de SEDAPAL, es necesario revisar detenidamente el documento. En general, el n√∫mero de suministro suele estar impreso en un lugar destacado del recibo, junto con la informaci√≥n del usuario y los detalles del consumo. En la mayor√≠a de los recibos de SEDAPAL, el n√∫mero de suministro se encuentra en la parte superior del documento, cerca de los datos del titular de la cuenta.
